thesis.move_description: UK-based Single Family Office acquiring $3.85M commercial real estate in Lisbon, Portugal. Targeting prime district Grade-A office or retail space for European diversification and stable income generation. Seeking shelter from UK tax burden and optimization through Portugal's favorable NHR tax regime.
thesis.expected_outcome: 4% annual rental yield with 7% annual capital appreciation, generating combined 11% gross returns. Strategic positioning in EU's attractive jurisdiction with established commercial tenant base and favorable NHR tax benefits.

control_and_rails.ips_notes: UK Family Office with established IPS. 20% allocation to international real estate, 15% to European exposure. Portugal commercial acquisition fits within mandate as EU hedge against UK market concentration and Brexit uncertainty. Income-generating focus with 4% rental yield and 7% appreciation targets align with wealth preservation strategy.
